alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 1:25PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. .Additional rises to the Two Rivers River near Hallock due to recent rainfall are anticipated. The river is expected to rise into Moderate flood stage by the late weekend into early next week period before falling back into Minor flood stage. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Two Rivers River near Hallock. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 807.0 feet, Storm sewer valves at 175 bridge, 4th St S, and the cemetery are closed and portable pumps are set up. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 803.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:00 PM CDT Friday was 803.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 806.6 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 802.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
